document_data.caption: A map showing the River Murghol joining the Clearflow River.
document_data.name: River Murghol
document_data.mainbody: The '''River Murghol''' was a waterway found on the outskirts of [[Thay]] and the [[Great Amber Steppes]] in [[east Faerûn]] and the [[Hordelands]].
document_data.Geography: The River Murghol originated in the [[Sunrise Mountains]] along Thay's eastern boundary. It flowed southeast from the mountains onto the great plains of the Hordelands, joining the [[Clearflow River]] northwest of the [[Mountains of Copper]]. It continued to flow south past the [[Ganathwood]] where it joined the [[River Rauthenflow]] in [[Murghôm]]. It stretched for approximately {{SI|500|mi|long=yes}} along its full span.
